headerTexts.title: Modern Local Services Infrastructure
headerTexts.subtitle: Arrivy connects business and their customers in real-time and engages them through the last mile
headerTexts.cusomter_intro_text: Join the smart businesses using Arrivy today, including:
headerTexts.header_bottom_title: Arrivy is powering thousands of service calls with the best in class features.

header-bottom-part-1: Ability to rate the service call instantly.
Shared schedules for office managers and team.

promo-items.heading: Delight your Customers
promo-items.text: Arrivy lets clients track your crew’s arrival times with real-time estimates, crew photos, map locations and automatic email/SMS notifications. With automated appointment reminders and in-job status messages, customers can get information in the modern way they prefer and reduce customer inquiries.

promo-items.heading: Connect your Team
promo-items.text: Shared calendars make it easy to schedule work for your crew. Schedulers have access to web app. Crew members can see their tasks and job details on easy-to-use mobile apps. Enterprise systems are kept in sync with REST API integration.

promo-items.heading: Bring predictability to your service calls
promo-items.text: Real time estimates along with our predictive AI engine gives your team a bird's-eye-view of all of the day’s appointments and progress. The Activity Feed is a fantastic tool for keeping your finger on the pulse of your business, providing a real-time readout of the status of all jobs.

promo-items.heading: Drive Operational Excellence
promo-items.text: Understand your jobs better with Arrivy’s tracking of job times, types, transit times, mileage etc. Planned reporting capabilities will let businesses slice-and-dice activities, time and customer satisfaction, on a job-type and per-personnel basis.

promo-bottom: Automated Communication cuts phone time down
Shared Calendar and Job Journal team keeps everyone in sync
Live tracking with real-time estimates for your customers

columns.title: Stay in touch
columns.text: Interested in finding out how Arrivy can help your business?

features-items.heading: Connect your Team
features-items.text1: Our shared calendars make it easy for all team members to stay in touch. Schedule an appointment on your computer; assign crew members and equipment. Arrivy’s intuitive interface makes it easy to see who is available.
features-items.text2: Your team stays in touch with mobile devices (iOS and Android). Crew members can see all the job details directly in Arrivy’s mobile apps. In addition to viewing these details, crew members can record status changes (job started, job ended, etc) and notes directly. These become a permanent record of what has happened on a job—accessible forever.

features-items.heading: Bring predictability to your service calls
features-items.text1: Our Dashboard provides a bird's-eye-view of all of the day’s appointments. You can view appointment details with the click of your mouse, and see the appointment locations and your crew members on a map in real-time. The Activity Feed is a fantastic tool for keeping your finger on the pulse of your business, providing a real-time readout of the status of all jobs.

features-items.heading: Delight your Customers
features-items.text1:
Your clients can track your crew’s arrival times with real-time estimates and email / SMS notifications. As soon as your crew member marks their status as “On our way,” the customer is sent an email or SMS. Clicking on the link in that message, the customer can see the crew location on a map and their estimated arrival time. 
As the crew proceeds to their destination, Arrivy tracks their progress and sends another email / SMS when they are about a mile away. Arrivy collects instant feedback from your customer at the end of job.
features-items.text2: Customers love knowing when their appointment will start and being able to see photos of crew members.

features-items.heading: Drive Operational Excellence
features-items.text1: Arrivy collects key metrics of field work and surfaces insights on how the work is progressing. Understand your jobs better with Arrivy’s tracking of job times, types, transit times, mileage etc. Planned reporting capabilities will let businesses slice-and-dice activities, time and customer satisfaction, on a job-type and per-personnel basis.
